song_lyrics: Denevāle re, tune to sabkuchh diyā,
Kyā kare ham kī ham ko to, kuchh nā milā...
Jab sukh āye dvāre ham rahe soye,
Ānkh khulī to fir bhī vo din khoye;
Apanī bhulone hamko to har pal chhalā,
Kyā kare hamkī hamko to kuchh nā milā... denevāle 1
Terī dayākā sāvan dhīre dhīre barsā,
Prāṇ papīhā fir bhī pyāsā hī tarsā;
Pyās baḍhtī gaī, koī bas nā chalā,
Kyā kare hamkī hamko to kuchh nā milā... denevāle 2
title: Denevāle re tune to sabkuchh diyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-302: unknown

Category: Anya Hindi Pad
